original_title: Celebrate this Avurudu season with exclusive discounts from Dialog
original_body_lines: To ring-in the Sinhala and Tamil New Year, Dialog has announced a range of exciting seasonal offers and discounts on a range of products from Dialog Home Broadband and Dialog Television to new mobile connections, smartphones and even their state-of-the-art Smart Home devices for purchases made via dialog.lk until 30th April 2023.
Customers can enjoy island wide delivery without any additional charge within 48 hours for ultimate convenience and a hassle-free shopping experience during this seasonal rush.

As part of this seasonal promotion, get a new Dialog Home Broadband connection starting from Rs. 2,990/- upwards, a Dialog Television connection starting from Rs.6,990/- upwards, or a brand new Dialog Television ViU Mini for just Rs.5,990/-. On the hunt for a new mobile connection? Get free 30GB for Facebook and WhatsApp for three months for any new prepaid connections or 4GB per month free for three months for any postpaid connections.

If you’re looking to treat a loved one or even yourself to a brand new smartphone, dialog.lk has a variety of exciting discounts on selected models and accessories. With each smartphone purchase customers will be eligible to enjoy 50GB free for two months. Finally, give your home a little TLC over the New Year with a range of Dialog Smart Home solutions starting from as low as Rs. 6,990/-.
